column1: Bob was a Hobbits of Bree.
Bob worked as an ostler in the Prancing Pony. After the Ruffians entered Bree
column3: so he could be home before nightfall.

column1: 2002: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game):
:Bob is attacked by two ruffians and a hunting dog at the stables of the Prancing Pony. Aragorn saves him.
